links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(log(3)); for (n=1, 20000, write("b016731.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 16 2009
